Room.Name: Grinning Sailor Cellar
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the liquor locker cellar of the Grinning Sailor Pub.
Room.LongDescription: Directly below you is a disposal pit where bodies and other garbage is thrown. Although dark, you can see a shuffling movement down there. As a matter of fact, the entire cellar is dark. Over near the west wall is a small table with but a single candle on it. Most of the space is taken up by great kegs of ale and rum.
